languages.text: "Постой, у тебя что, личность есть? Смотрите-ка, наш булыжник не только выдержками из Лекса общается!"
"Hang on, since when do you have a personality? Look at that, our resident killjoy doesn't just talk in Lex paragraphs!"
languages.original_text: "Постой, у тебя что, личность есть? Смотрите-ка, наш булыжник не только выдержками из Лекса общается!"

traits.locale_text: "Hang on, since when do you have a personality? Look at that, our hard man doesn't just talk in Lex excerpts!"
"Hang on, since when do you have a personality? Look at that, our hard man doesn't just talk in Lex excerpts!"
"Hang on, since when do you have a personality? Look at that, our hard man doesn't just talk in Lex excerpts!"
"Hang on, since when do you have a personality? Look at that, our resident killjoy doesn't just talk in Lex paragraphs!"
"Hang on, since when do you have a personality? Look at that, our resident killjoy doesn't just talk in Lex paragraphs!"

languages.text: 「ちょっと待って、あなたに個人的な感情なんてあったっけ？見てよこれ。堅物さんがレックスの条文以外の言葉をしゃべってるよ！」
languages.original_text: "Hang on, since when do you have a personality? Look at that, our resident killjoy doesn't just talk in Lex paragraphs!"

traits.locale_text: 「ちょっと待って、あなたに個人的な感情なんてあったっけ？見てよこれ。堅物さんがレックスの条文以外の言葉をしゃべってるよ！」

languages.text: "Augenblick, seit wann habt Ihr denn eine Persönlichkeit? Sieh sich das einer an, unser Spielverderber redet doch nicht nur in Lex-Paragraphen!"
languages.original_text: "Hang on, since when do you have a personality? Look at that, our resident killjoy doesn't just talk in Lex paragraphs!"

traits.locale_text: "Augenblick, seit wann habt Ihr denn eine Persönlichkeit? Sieh sich das einer an, unser Spielverderber redet doch nicht nur in Lex-Paragraphen!"

languages.text: « Minute, depuis quand vous avez une personnalité, vous ? Regardez-moi ça : le rabat-joie de service ne se contente pas de citer des paragraphes de la Lex ! »
languages.original_text: "Hang on, since when do you have a personality? Look at that, our resident killjoy doesn't just talk in Lex paragraphs!"

traits.locale_text: « Minute, depuis quand vous avez une personnalité, vous ? Regardez-moi ça : le rabat-joie de service ne se contente pas de citer des paragraphes de la Lex ! »

languages.text: «Un momento, ¿desde cuándo tiene usted personalidad? ¡Quién lo iba a decir, nuestro aguafiestas particular también sabe hablar sin citar la Lex!».
languages.original_text: "Hang on, since when do you have a personality? Look at that, our resident killjoy doesn't just talk in Lex paragraphs!"

traits.locale_text: «Un momento, ¿desde cuándo tiene usted personalidad? ¡Quién lo iba a decir, nuestro aguafiestas particular también sabe hablar sin citar la Lex!».

languages.text: “等一下，你居然还知道什么叫惊讶？哎哟，看来我们的泼冷水大师，除了法律条款之外也知道些别的嘛！”
languages.original_text: "Hang on, since when do you have a personality? Look at that, our resident killjoy doesn't just talk in Lex paragraphs!"

traits.locale_text: “等一下，你居然还知道什么叫惊讶？哎哟，看来我们的泼冷水大师，除了法律条款之外也知道些别的嘛！”

languages.text: "Yok artık, kişisel görüş mü belirttin sen? İşe bak, bizim oyunbozanın ağzından Lex maddesi olmayan bir söz çıktı!"
languages.original_text: "Hang on, since when do you have a personality? Look at that, our resident killjoy doesn't just talk in Lex paragraphs!"

languages.original_text: "Hang on, since when do you have a personality? Look at that, our resident killjoy doesn't just talk in Lex paragraphs!"
